## TypesettingUtils.getDirection() function

Returns the first strong direction (LTR or RTL) found for a given array of \[\[GlyphData\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getDirection(glyphs: GlyphData[], offset: number): UnicodeUtils.Direction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  glyphs | [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Array containing \[\[GlyphData\]\]. |
|  offset | number | <code>glyphDataArray</code> offset. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UnicodeUtils.Direction](./harp-text-canvas.unicodeutils.direction.md)

Strong direction.
